Nerangs.ab: aṣ̌əm vōhū čahār pad harw ašamwohū-ēw wars rāy pad harw ēk čahār jām ī zōhr šustan čiyōn ka-š warr ī ātaxš ī warahrām pad ān ōy wars āmēxtag nē mānēd.
"He should recite four aṣ̌əm vōhūs. At each aṣ̌əm vohū, he should wash the wars in each one of the four goblets so the ashes of the Ātaxš ī Warahrām do not remain mixed in the wars."
čahār ašem vohu čon piš neveštam pas digar be-ḫalqe dar-ārand dar hamān ḫalqe-ye zarrin andazand va hezār-o-yek bār b-āb-e pādyāvi foru barand va bar-āvarand va varsdān nahand

"(He should recite) four Aṣ̌əm Vohūs as I have written before. Then, they bring (the vars) again to the ring and put it on the golden ring and immerse and take it out of the pādyāvi-water thousend and one times."
